将单元格内容快捷渲染为链接形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as links.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为长内容省略形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as truncated with an ellipsis.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为可复制形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as copyable.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为长内容省略+可复制形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as truncated with an ellipsis and copyable.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为标签形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as tags.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为状态徽标形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as status badges.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为图片形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as images.

在这个例子中，数值测试1与数值测试2字段本质上都是数值型，但在`custom-f.en-us: In this example, both “Numeric Test 1” and “Numeric Test 2” are numeric fields, but in `custom-format` mode you can use JS functions provided via `customFormatFuncs` to change how the content is rendered in the cell.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为角标形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content with a corner mark.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为跨行单元格合并形式。.en-us: Quickly render cells merged across rows.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为下拉链接菜单形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as a dropdown link menu.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为图片型头像形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as image avatars.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为迷你折线图形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as a mini line chart.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为迷你柱状图形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as a mini bar chart.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为迷你面积图形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as a mini area chart.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为迷你进度图形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as a mini progress bar.

基于配置项`progressShowPercent`控制是否显示进度数值。.en-us: Use `progressShowPercent` to control whether the percentage value is shown.

基于配置项`progressPercentPosition`调整进度数值位置。.en-us: Use `progressPercentPosition` to adjust where the percentage is displayed.

基于配置项`progressPercentPrecision`控制进度数值小数位.en-us: Use `progressPercentPrecision` to control the decimal places of the percentage.

基于配置项`progressStrokeLinecap`控制进度条风格。.en-us: Use `progressStrokeLinecap` to control the style of the progress bar.

基于配置项`progressSize`控制进度条像素尺寸。.en-us: Use `progressSize` to control the pixel size of the progress bar.

基于配置项`progressColor`控制进度条颜色，支持渐变色。.en-us: Use `progressColor` to control the progress bar color, including gradients.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为迷你环形进度图形式。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as a mini ring progress chart.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为按钮形式，并通过回调监听相关事件。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as buttons and listen for related events via callbacks.

配合`color`与`variant`参数渲染具有不同颜色和形态的按钮。.en-us: Use the `color` and `variant` parameters to render buttons with different colors and styles.

同一单元格中的每个按钮都可以单独控制是否添加气泡确认框。.en-us: Each button in the same cell can independently control whether to include a popconfirm.

同一单元格中的每个按钮都可以单独控制是否添加文字提示框。.en-us: Each button in the same cell can independently control whether to include a tooltip.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为勾选框形式，并通过回调监听相关事件。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as checkboxes and listen for related events via callbacks.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为开关形式，并通过回调监听相关事件。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as switches and listen for related events via callbacks.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为下拉菜单形式，并通过回调监听相关事件。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as dropdown menus and listen for related events via callbacks.

将单元格内容快捷渲染为下拉选择形式，并通过回调监听相关事件。.en-us: Quickly render cell content as select controls and listen for related events via callbacks.

目前已有的快捷再渲染模式满足不了你的需求？没关系，任何组件元素都可以作为单元格值.en-us: The built-in quick render modes don’t cover your use case? No problem—any component can be passed as a cell value 😉 (recommended for static display only).
